homeWeatherPermissionDialogBody: Vezu uses your location to fetch the local weather so we can craft outfit suggestions that match current conditions.

helpSubtitle: Find quick answers or reach our support team.
helpContactDescription: Email us and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
helpFaq1Question: How do I add new clothing items?
helpFaq1Answer: Tap the + button on the wardrobe page, choose camera or gallery, and confirm the upload. AI tags the item automatically.
helpFaq2Question: How does AI create outfit suggestions?
helpFaq2Answer: When you request a combination, the app sends your saved wardrobe metadata to the GPT-powered stylist and returns a curated outfit in seconds.
helpFaq3Question: Where can I manage my subscription?
helpFaq3Answer: Open the Subscription tab from the bottom navigation (coming soon) to view plan details, renewals, and billing history.
helpFaq4Question: How can I report a problem or share feedback?
helpFaq4Answer: Use the contact email above to send us details or screenshots. Our team monitors the inbox daily.
privacyIntro: AI Outfit Combiner ("app", "we", "our") values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding your data when using our mobile application.
privacySection1Point1:
1.1. Account Information
• Name, email address, and profile picture when signing in with Google.
• Unique user ID (provided by Firebase).
privacySection1Point2:
1.2. User-Provided Content
• Photos of clothing uploaded from camera or gallery.
• User prompts and outfit preferences.
• Profile details: age, gender, subscription plan.
privacySection1Point3:
1.3. Usage Data
• In-app activities (creating, saving, and viewing outfits, subscription actions).
• Performance and crash data collected via Firebase Crashlytics and Analytics.
privacySection2Point1:
We use the collected information to:
• Verify and manage user accounts.
• Store clothing images and analyze them via the GPT API.
• Generate AI-based outfit suggestions from your wardrobe.
• Monitor subscription status and send renewal reminders.
• Improve app performance and user experience.
• Personalize content and recommendations.
privacySection3Point1: We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties.
privacySection3Point2: Service providers (e.g., Firebase, OpenAI GPT API) receive data only as necessary to provide app services.
privacySection3Point3: Data may be shared with authorities when legally required or in cases of misuse.
privacySection4Point1: Clothing photos are stored securely in Firebase Storage.
privacySection4Point2: User data is stored in Firestore with strong access controls.
privacySection4Point3: Account and subscription data are protected via Firebase Auth and Cloud Functions.
privacySection4Point4: Data is retained only as long as necessary for app functionality.
privacySection5Point2: Delete clothing photos and outfit history.
privacySection5Point3: Update or delete account and subscription data.
privacySection5Point4: For data-related requests, contact us at: support@aioutfitcombiner.com.
privacySection6Point1: The app is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal data from users under 13.
privacySection7Point1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Updates will be communicated via the app or email.
